EmailTemplate.name: 02-09-22 HOS MyNCR training for Raas Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: It’s time to register for the upcoming MyNCR training
EmailTemplate.textOnly: MyNCR, NCR’s customer portal will soon be available to all Wendy’s RaaS customers. This portal allows you to manage your business with NCR anytime, anywhere! MyNCR provides you with access to real-time information for your account, enable users within your organization to manage your account, approve or modify program orders, and submit and track help desk tickets order online. Join your NCR account team to learn more about MyNCR. This 60-minute webcast will provide you with the everything that you need to know about MyNCR. During this webcast, you will learn how to do the following: - Add users to your account and assign access to functionalities - Approve or modify a program order - View invoices - Locate order status and tracking information for shipping Add this event to your calendar today by selecting a link below to register for a session to find out everything you need to know about MyNCR, the new self-service portal that will be available to you. You only need to choose one session to attend. Click here for the February 22th 8:00 AM ET training session <[[https://teams.microsoft.com/registration/9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRcQ,RmqdKXaCSU-Eh6iYlXyUSA,AtbIpPwGtk2hK5NmSo1WYw,0YKAs3gtJEyEzkV2YFtkJA,U8EjWUK83kKNroP3_XIjxA,V_JLSNt48kyd5Ea4XhBzgw?mode=read&tenantId=ae4df1f7-611e-444f-897e-f964e1205171]]> Click here for the February 23th 1:00 PM ET training session <[[https://teams.microsoft.com/registration/9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRcQ,RmqdKXaCSU-Eh6iYlXyUSA,AtbIpPwGtk2hK5NmSo1WYw,vsKjB0hDQU23BwQs4G_Eqw,j07s9FC-Ek2qIvQSLMh4UQ,4GZ8__tYl0ebdlD6V_5Qbw?mode=read&tenantId=ae4df1f7-611e-444f-897e-f964e1205171]]> Click here for the February 24th 5:00 PM ET training session <[[https://teams.microsoft.com/registration/9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRcQ,RmqdKXaCSU-Eh6iYlXyUSA,AtbIpPwGtk2hK5NmSo1WYw,WFTeIxOja0WOWBgWZOfrlQ,pKLN_E1iQk2NMvRD7pURng,7MHgixu910Gh1hsNWmvwPw?mode=read&tenantId=ae4df1f7-611e-444f-897e-f964e1205171]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
